about_the_game:
Welcome to your new job. You will be viewing a recording of COS-249. The test subject is Ë̡̻̰͍̩̱̰́-̡̳͓̹̘̰͂͋̄̏̈́͊̌͌͌́͝͝͠3̧̮͓̖̭̻͙̼̮͒̿͒͗̄͂7̤̝̣̣͓͈̻͚̗̺̪̙̈́̊̄̊͘̚͝ͅ6̛͖̟͇̩̘͕͊̓͐̃̓̈̈̈͐́̚ he will be recording his full experience in the room.
The room is full of anomalous objects and entities. The only objective is to stay alive.


But don't worry there is c͕̻̺̙̙͕̠͙̗̽̃͆̒͐̈́́͒͌̆̊̈̓̇̈́́̃̿̆̄̑͘͜á̧̱͍̻͙̼̝̞̭̰̼̼͓͇̤̹͍̘͈̺̻̝̭̦̠̩̞̐͌̾̀̒̀̀̑̂̍͘̕͝ͅk̡̛̮͊͆͋̉̑̍̏͊͌́̌̀́͝ę̯̘̤̟̰͇̩͙̤̹͈̝̮͙̬͓̳̗̲̤̟̮́͌̆͐̍̈́́̍͝͝ͅͅͅ at the end.




COS-249 is a horror experience with an in-depth secret story, mainly focused on a single-player analog horror experience of a test subject enduring the tests of the anomalous room. Managing multiple anomalous creatures, each with its own specifications, until the timer runs out is the only path to surviving the wicked experiment.

Key Features


  • Point & Click - The gameplay features static movement with an interactive point-and-click mechanic, allowing players to interact with various anomalous objects and elements within their environment.

  • Various Enemies - Players will encounter a diverse array of enemies, each presenting unique challenges and requiring different strategies to manage. The experience of juggling these various threats adds a layer of complexity and tension

  • Secret Story - The game offers a deeply immersive and intricate secret story that extends beyond the primary gameplay experience. Unraveling this hidden narrative involves discovering clues and piecing together the larger mystery, providing an additional layer of depth and intrigue that keeps players engaged long after the main game is over.

content_descriptors.notes: Death, Psychological horror, Horror, analog horror

name: COS-249

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4100 4-Core
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB GDDR5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4100 4-Core
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB GDDR5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
